ygData.subject: Good-bye Herald, hello training.
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois shows Herald and Child all around the embassy. The communications room, the conference room, and everything else. Everything except the secret training

Vulois shows Herald and Child all around the embassy. The 
communications room, the conference room, and everything else. 
Everything except the secret training room. Finaly the tour has 
finished.

"Thank you Herald, but now your time has come. You must go. I will 
notify you when you may take Child back. We will be training a bit, 
and than there is a huge, real life assignement that he will do. Now 
come Child. Now you mus meet Windrazor. Good-bye Herald."

Vulois turns back into the embassy, signaling for child to follow.
